# BeatOps

> BeatOps is the all-in-one desktop platform for type beat producers. It automates uploads, thumbnails, videos, metadata, and distribution across YouTube, BeatStars, and SoundCloud. It also includes cross-platform data analytics, a kanban board for production tracking, and beat catalog management. Available for macOS and Windows. Everything runs locally - your beats never leave your computer.

## Key Features

- **Multi-Platform Upload**: YouTube, YouTube Shorts, BeatStars, and SoundCloud from one workflow
- **Thumbnail Generation**: Professional thumbnails with templates and branding in 3 formats
- **Video Creation**: Generate videos in landscape, vertical, and square formats
- **Audio Analysis**: Automatic BPM, key, mood, and genre detection
- **Template System**: Reusable templates for titles, descriptions, tags, and visuals
- **Data Analytics**: Cross-platform performance tracking across YouTube and SoundCloud
- **Kanban Board**: Visual production pipeline with customizable columns
- **Beat Management**: Track every beat from idea to release
- **Stem Management**: Auto-detect, link, and zip stems for BeatStars
- **Batch Processing**: Process and upload multiple beats at once
- **Scheduling**: Set upload days and times per platform

## Downloads

- [Latest Release](https://github.com/snarebes/BeatOps/releases/latest): Download the latest version
- [macOS (Apple Silicon)](https://beatops.io/download.html): DMG installer for macOS
- [Windows](https://beatops.io/download.html): EXE installer for Windows
